original_text: You must keep separate this meat from the sheep's ribs, as well as the top part of its right leg. Those are the pieces that you lifted up to the Lord as an offering to him. Those pieces belong to Aaron and his sons.
korean_text: 너는 그 흔든 요제물 곧 아론과 그의 아들들의 위임식 숫양의 가슴과 넓적다리를 거룩하게 하라

sentences.original_text: You must keep separate this meat from the sheep's ribs
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이 고기를 양의 갈비뼈에서 분리해야 한다

sentences.original_text: as well as the top part of its right leg
Those are the pieces that you lifted up
to the Lord as an offering to him
Those pieces belong to Aaron and his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 그 부분들은 아론과 그의 아들들에게 속한다
